column1: We had a fantastic stay at Cecil Oberoi. The Cecil Oberoi always exceeds the hospitality standards. Our experience has always been awesome right from the check-in till check-out. They make all guest feel special. I had been staying at this hotel whenever I visit Shimla. Looking forward for next visit again to Shimla and staying at the Cecil.

Oberoi Cecil is the place to stay if you visit Shimla and want to explore mall road. It is located at the end of the Mall road. We stayed in the luxury suite. The rooms are spacious and beautifully done.  Food in the restaurant was nice. However, the stand out factor for me was the service. Service in all aspects stands out and adds to the overall experience. Would especially like to thank Ankita for all the assistance. Wow experience.

We had an awesome experience at the Cecil Oberoi Hotel. The warmth and the welcome that we received is something that can not be matched with any other property. We would like to  give a special mention to Deepika and Ankita from the guest relations. Thank you for helping us out with everything. We would really like to thank the chef Mr. Rajkumar for treating us with scrumptious Jain food and was always eager to cook delicous food. Special mention for Kartik for being such a wonderful host at the restaurant. Thank You Oberoi Cecil for making our stay more wonderful.

Fantastic location, very close to city centre, beautiful  vintage interiors, fantastic food and excellent excellent hospitality...  Special mention of Chef Rajkumar, abhi and kartik in the restaurant, Ankita and Deepika at the reception..

The entire experience of Oberoi Cecil is awesome . My fifth visit and I would still want to come back every year . Everyone was great but I remember few names  1. Mr Rajkumar the head chef -His food is awesome. One of the  main reason for coming back is his food. 2. Reyansh ,Sahil and Rohit were exemplary in their service at the restaurant 3. Mami the housekeeping manager was so concerned about our Little one she got the entire room baby proofed and also helped with bottle sanitizing  4. Deepika the front office manager was very helpful . Her team mate Anjita(forgetting the name) was so helpful and playing so gently with the kid.  5. Guard Mr Daljit was also very helpful.

This was my second visit and as expected you guys are amazing and bring smiles. Raj Kumar ji the sous chef at his best hospitality and his super recommendations at the dinning. A very nice and humble person. 5 stars to Raj Kumar ji and his team. Kshitij also one person whose friendly attitude and service was something that I will always remember. Deepak ji at the barb queue was very nice and indeed a very innovative and good photographer. Ankita at the check-in was sweet and cordial. Was surprisingly very glad to know that she had a national level high jumping back ground..Hope to be back Cecil team !! Last but not the least.. Saurabh at the bar. You HAVE to try his amazing cocktails.. this chap has some talent !!

The best hotel to stay in shimla , homely ( staff and accomodation ) simply loved my stat   Starting with Ankita ( check in staff ). We came in by 9 in nite , it was freezing for us , before rushing into checking she made us comfortable with a drink, felt so good and welcomed. Then slowly at our place did checking formalities .   Moving forward the room was decorated for our honeymoon spl. Not sure of the names . Ankita made us feel so spl. Then heading to dinner Sonam greeted and served us with a smile.  The spread at breakfast is apt and perfect. The chef makes every dish perfect with his hidden ingredients. We tried to guess so many ingredients but to our surprise something healthy and secret is always there in the dish. Hats off to the chef . Soups are out of the world !!!!‚Ä¶

This is my second stay in the hotel and Certainly my rating has improved and loved the Christmas stay in the hotel . Especially Deepika Kukreja mam made sure that we were taken care of .The hotel's old walnut furniture is lovely and decoration is awesome.Love the Christmas decor  .I gave this 5/5 as I really felt that our Christmas holidays are well spent here .Best destination for winter visit .Kudos to team and every one  come here just once in your lifetime without thinking about your pocket .

Excellent!!  The word describes it all. Fantastic staff and services, both live up to the expectations and the location is an added advantage. A special mention for the detailing done for the food.  In a nutshell, when in Shimla look no beyond than this.  KUDOS, keep up the good work.

The Oberoi Cecil is heritage property but they are maintaining that really well. I will appreciate there cleaning staff they are doing there job really well. All the staff was really courteous we enjoyed the stay. They try to solve all the query and questions. Cecil is the property where u should stay in Shimla. Had a great time food was really fresh and tasty. Due to Christmas üéÑ they decorated the hotel and maximum of the decore was done by their team. Really wonderful that shows their love to this property. From our side 10/10.üòç

One of the best properties I‚Äôve ever stayed at.  We were welcomed with a turmeric drink. This is not too far from the city, the concierge helped us with great places to visit such as Shimla Brewery, toy train to Tara Devi etc. the games room was fun while it was so cold outside we got to play a few games of Table Tennis. The nights were so cold they set up a bone fire outside the hotel which was amazing. The rooms are royal and cozy and not to mention the breakfast spread is AMAZING.   Head Chef Dilip ji was a phenomenal host who made us fresh french toast, dosa and museli. One could tell the freshness of the produce and meat. Dilip ji was so gracious and made our breakfast enjoyable and memorable. We just couldn‚Äôt help over eating which led us to skip our lunches and have light‚Ä¶

Team: Oberoi cecil is a wonderful combination of Excellent property managed by amazing team with highly customer centric mindset. Kudos to Deepika, Ankita, Aanchal, Manasvi, Tameema, Gaurav. Right from pre-checkin confirmations, to checkin, stay and check-out : All points so well taken care of. Food is very yummy and Sous Chef Mr Raj Kumar personally attended and interacted so well. Entire team is awesome and we were very very well taken care of by Aanchal and Ankita.  Facilities: Indoor pool is a great delight, Kids play area, Lounge, Lobby - everything is so nice and classy and experiential.  Location: Well placed within city center limits

I travelled with my parents who are seniors. The staff were very courteous and attentive. The stay was comfortable. The buffet breakfast is outstanding. Chef Raj Kumar Bhatia takes special interest in attending to the guests' needs and customizing dishes. We appreciate the automatic upgrade to the premium valley view room, from which the views were indeed mesmerizing. We also enjoyed receiving a pair of traditional Himachali wool caps as a present from the hotel. They shall serve as souvenirs of a lovely trip.

We visited The Oberoi Cecil in October end 2021 with our children. The hotel is true example of luxury and exemplary service standards. We were given a beautiful suite overlooking the Himalayas. The heated pool was the highlight of the stay. The hotel is located very close to the Mall Road and hence very convenient for tourists. The team at The Oberoi Cecil went out of their way to make our stay so special. Few names that I must mention Sadashivam ( went out of way and made the F&B experience absolutely unforgettable). The entire FO team lead by Ms. Deepika and the lady who checked us in and the lady who saw us off on the last ( Manasvi if I remember correctly) were so warm and professional. And of course on the top of list was the leader himself Mr. Vishal Virmani who met every‚Ä¶

Placed in a prime location with amazing views of the Himalayas and Shimla city along with luxury, great food and extremely cordial staff places it among the top in Shimla. One must not think twice before selecting hotel for trip to Shimla city.

- Extremely Hospitsble staff. To name a few Rajkumar, Kartik, Gaurav, Rohit from F&B. Deepika, Sanjana from housekeeping and front desk and Sunil (driver) and the spa lady therapist....All these staff were exceptional. The hotel is a true five star and they really care about every small thing about their guests. We went in for 4 nights for a birthday and anniversary Celebration. They decorated the room and sent in complementary cakes on both occasions. They kept checking with us if we need something. Rooms are very nice and well equipped. Children play area in particular is large and equipped with Xbox, Air hockey, Carrom, pool, and play area. We enjoyed swimming in the 30 degrees warm pool morning and evening and also took many Spa therapies. They organised bonfire every‚Ä¶

All the staff was exceptionally professional and attentive from the reception to the pool side to the restaurant and in dining service as a family we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and felt very much valued and cared for. Outstanding.   Special Mention for Rajat & Sonam at the restaurant & Veronica from House Keeping for making our stay comforting.   Thank you team Oberoi Cecil

The hotel has amazing views from the valley view rooms. The hotel staff, amenities and services were excellent üëèüèª. Special mention to the hotel staff namely Mr Rohit, Mr Abhishek and Mr. Rajkumar for making our stay so comfortable and enjoyable. Each meal we had was delicious and well served. Thank you to the Oberoi Cecil team for giving us a memorable experience and making our trip to Shimla unforgettable üòä.

We visited ur hotel on 19 Nov 2021 on our wedding anniversary...as usual v really enjoyed a lot as the hospitality of ur hotel and staff is amazing...especially in the bar section Mr Saurab...and the cheff Mr rajkumar... They made our day very special...wish to visit again and again Regards  Richa & Gajender‚ù§

I have been to this hotel many times and every time , I am floored by the hospitality provided by the team, specially Chef Bhatia , he comes across as a very warm person, always smiling and ready to serve you the best of the cuisine that he can offer.  He is always happy to share the recipe . Chef Bhatia , pls keep it up. I'll see you shortly

The whole experience in staying at Shimla could not be complete if you do not stay at Oberoi Cecil. A heritage property, well preserved and maintained. We were overwhelmed by the EXTRAORDINARY OBEROI HOSPITALITY. This is beyond expectation. Our complete family leisure time was very well taken care by the management of the hotel right from the beginning to check-out. Everyone in the hotel whom we had interacted or used their service, their response and delivery was outstanding. Hats-off to the management. Moreover we are still not out the Shimla 'hangover' and we will definitely visit again and stay with family.

This is one of the best heritage property I have visited. Out of the world hospitality and service. The food was extremely good. We got an upgrade to the suite which was the best part. Deepika went out of her lengths to make our stay even more comfortable and memorable. The most important part was that I had forgotten my wallet in the room and I checked out and left for Manali and then for Chandigarh. So Mami one of the front desk manager made sure that it reached to me safely so she sent the wallet to our Chandigarh hotel before we headed back to our hometown.  This was a very very kind gesture that is always going to remain with me of these hardworking people of Oberoi Cecil, Shimla.  Highly recommended and kudos to the entire team.

Chef rajkumar is the star of the cecil oberoi.  He serves amazing food and also gives very devoted classes to any of his guests.   During our stay chef Raj kumar attended us humbly and cooked food at our request , he made our stay memorable just because of chef rajkunar we want to attend the hotel again and again. His dishes were highlight of our stay..

Staff was extremely courteous and helpful and very prompt at entire property in every department be it front desk, F&B, Housekeeping . Chef Rajkumar went out of his way to prepare customised kids menu and make us feel at home. His dishes were highlight of our stay, unforgettable taste of Malai Kofta a must have.

Fantastic‚Ä¶.nothing to beat their hospitality  The staff from house keeping to front office to restaurant every thing was superb  Food and service was par excellent  Chefs looked after each and every detail  Food was delicious service was too good  Toiletries were of good standard  A beautiful hotel after a long drive from Chandigarh  Would only go to Shimla again to stay in Oberoi  A stay truly wonderful etched with good memories  Well done Oberoi staff

An excellent hotel.. 134 years old property British looks, Woden finishing with amazing hospitality!  Very courteous staff!  Always happy to serve 24*7  Deepika mam is just awesome .. always there with smiling face ! U just want anything .. she will get it !   Big part is what u think u get it .. it‚Äôs all above your imagination!   We wear 15 peoples and all are stick Jain.. Special thanks to MR Rajkumar Bhatia, head chef of hotel .. he take Care for us very well, prepare very yummy and delicious Jain food,all the 4 days ..  anything u order he makes it !  Many thanks to Reshav and Pawan who are always there on dinning area to serve food on our table !   He gave us take away food (sandwiches and juice ) for our last day travelling, it helps a lot in our journey !!   Overall‚Ä¶

Great hospitality at the Oberoi..as usual. The view from the room is amazing  and the staff is extremely friendly to make your visit absolutely worth the money. Good food, made to your taste always adds to the experience. Thoroughly enjoyed the stay!

Had an opportunity to stay at the Cecil Oberoi for 3 nights. What an experience. A period hotel that stood the test of time. From the rooms to the spa and health club was great. Had dinner at the Resturant all three nights and the food was Superb. Chief Raj Kumar is an inspiration. His interaction and care for the client was exceptional. He is a stand up ambassador for the Oberoi Cecil. That being said all the staff that we interacted with are exemplary in their tasks and overall the hospitality is something that will always bring us back

Such a charming little place.  The history is that this was Mr Oberoi's first hotel and all his love has clearly gone into it! The staff is lovely and although they were short staffed as recovering from Covid and lockdowns, they had recently reopened and they did their best every time.  The breakfast spread is great, the food is excellent and the chef was wonderful. Loved the lounge area for just taking breaks and having a coffee or a drink between all the Mall road walks!  We did a gorgeous dinner in their fancy dining room and it was amazing an experience.

This was our first stay in an Oberoi hotel as we are staunch believer in Taj hospitality. But we don‚Äôt regret our decision as in service and maintaining the high standards of hospitality Oberoi Cecil was even better than our expectations.  From check in onwards everything was perfect.Beautiful well maintained rooms with lovely furniture, exceptional services by each and every department made our 2 nights stay really memorable.  Ankita from check in was really sweet and in a very cleaver and efficient way kept engaged us in lovely chitchat to cover  the slight  delay in allotting us the room.  Usually we get upset if check in takes more than 15 minutes but in this case we didn‚Äôt mind the delay as Ankita kept us engaged us with her knowledgeable discussion about Shimla and Oberoi‚Ä¶

Had gone to Oberoi cecil shimla for 3 days for my son's birthday and had an amazing uber luxurious experience there.... The best service and value for money luxurious experience....the cart view is an amazing restaurant..just to call out the amazing service and food by chef rajkumar and the service by mr.rajat and mr.pawan under the leadership of mr.nilesh jain... One must experience this beautiful sevice once in there life...for me it will be many more in the coming future...kudos to the Oberoi group and thanks for making my family get together so wonderful

Stayed at the Oberoi Cecil for my brother's birthday...it is an amazing property with everything amazing...I could not point one negative in anything...the cartview restaurant was out of this world..special mention for the amazing service done by mr.rajat he was exceptional under the astute leadership of there f&b manager mr.nilesh...the chef mr.rajkumar Bhatia has an exceptional team who made the stay more beautiful with the delicious dishes they prepared...I was amazed at the small details the team took care of...each and everyone of them visited our table just to make our experience more splendid...also ms.ajita made the check in experience seamless and smooth... Iam happy to have this beautiful Oberoi Cecil experience in my life...thank you team oberoi

Every time I stay in an Oberoi Hotel there is something special to remember, some gesture , some experience ! That is what sets it apart amongst the best Hotels in the World.  It is imbedded in the very culture of the staff to look after every guest as a very important person.  right from the check to check out the experience was pleasant. The young men at the reception went out of their way in helping us with the luggage at the time of check out.  The Chef Ramkumar Bhatia appeared magically at the very moment when my wife was wondering about the recipe of a dish and he so enthusiastically obliged by writing it for her. Ms. Bajpai was very charming and diligent and so  were the young men who served us on the first night. The rooms are spacious and very beautifully furnished with‚Ä¶

Had stayed for couple of nights with my kids and wife and the property is amazing. We really enjoyed the indoor temperature controlled swimming pool, the room had amazing views , and the team was very warm and hospitable. We loved the mocktails and cocktails at the bar with the live piano being played. Would like to specially thanks Vishal and his team for the amazing time we had.

I have had the pleasure of staying at Oberoi Cecil and I am actually in the middle of my stay here in the property.. Last 3 days here have been some of the best I have ever had on vacations. Oberoi's staff is just super.. I hv stayed in a lot of premium properties across the world but this one is one of the best I have stayed in. Rite from the check in to the breakfast and dinners.. Mr Raj Kumar the Chef at the restaurant is one of the gems of the property. He is so personalised. So detail oriented..We are having a great time here and I am one hundred percent sure that it will continue to be very very good.  Thank you Oberoi's for making our stay special.. We thourly enjoyed

Cecil is a beautiful property with great legacy and heritage.  We stayed here for 3 days and were in total aww of the services they provide.  I‚Äôve visited many hotels, but Hospitality like Cecil, I‚Äôve never seen, They just don‚Äôt know how to say No to their guests  They have great food, all are meals were delicious, special thanks to Chef Raj Kumar, even after being such a senior chef, he was so humble and took time to visit us time to time and recommend us different dishes and specially came to serve us and tell his life journey and he even gave us a cookery session after taking out his precious time. Apart from this Rohit took great care of us at the new outdoor space of Cecil property with Borne-fire in the chilly weather and drinks  They even have a variety of Massage‚Ä¶

Excellent hospitality G.M. n the whole staff is so kind n helpful. Chef Mr.Rajkumar.Bhatia. makes awesome dishes shouldtry one . If visiting Shimla must stay in Oberoi Cecil it's once in lifetime experience. Would highly recommend. Rest name says it all. OBEROI....

It had been a while since we stepped out of Maharashtra.. Tired of visiting Lonvala and Mahabaleshwar, we decided to visit Shimla (Queen of mountains)... After a fantastic lay over at JW Marriott Chandigarh we reached Shimla... Everything about Shimla is refreshing...We decided to stay at the most iconic heritage 150 yrs old hotel of Shimla, The Oberoi Cecil... Everything about This property is so Royal and has a touch of British era...Right From the entrance to hotel room, service, mannerism of Staff, food... This was our first stay at a Oberoi chain of hotels, though we are very well aware abe have experienced impeccable hospitality of Trident hotels at Udaipur, Agra etc..   Location wise this beautiful hotel is situated bang in the City, near Shimla station, Vidan Sabha, a‚Ä¶

We stayed in the property from 16th to 19th October and it has been a very hospitable environment all around. Starting from Ms Deepika and Ms Ajita in front office to chef Mr Raj and Mr Pawan in F&B. We were highly obliged by their hospitality and personalisation. Mr Raj catered to our needs above and beyond the menu and Mr Pawan and team gave him full support. Ms Gureet and Ms Manasvi were very helpful in their areas, and room hospitality people specially Nima very artistically setted up our suites. We are thankful for making our trip such memorable that we have our expectations up higher in our next visit to this home and ongoing Oberoi properties. Regards, Shreyans Anchalia

Had an excellent family holiday at Cecil Shimla. The ambience and the whole staff were just superb giving an Immaculate service  with a smile. The general manager Mr Virmani takes keen interest in all the bookings and makes sure that the entire team works towards achieving the comfort and satisfaction of the guests. Excellent food at the restaurant by chef Raj Kumar with ever smiling servers Rohit n kshiti Not to miss the superb cocktails at the lounge by saurabh. Perfect housekeeping and cleanliness... A perfect holiday experience...

I think what made the mountains and a rather crowded Shimla grow on me was my stay at Cecil! The warm hospitality, outstanding food and cozy interiors made my overall stay comfortable and beautiful. From miss Deepika at the front desk to the amazing chefs, Mr Pawan, Mr Siddhant and others at the restaurant who made sure we had a smooth dinner amidst rush hours, Mr Saurabh at the Bar who was generous enough to teach us some drinks , to the lady in charge of hospitality, the staff felt like family, all smiles and tremendously warm.   Can‚Äôt wait to revisit!!

There comes a time in everyone‚Äôs life when they realise the value of good hospitality. The Oberoi Cecil will ensure that you realise this the moment you step into their hotel. Warmly greeted with traditional folded hands by the valet, the guard, the door man, the concierge, the manager and finally the receptionist - you already feel like royalty within your first few minutes at the property. Everyone has a smile on their face. Everyone is genuinely happy to help you even with the smallest of things. They might take time to fulfil them, but they‚Äôll never say no to your needs.  Me and my family (8 of us) were travelling to celebrate my mother in-law‚Äôs birthday and had booked 4 rooms. On our request, the hotel upgraded my mother in-law to an upper category room as a special gesture‚Ä¶

The OBEROI CECIL ‚Äòhas it all‚Äô for us, centrally located, room with pleasant view & awesome weather, but the thing that really sets this property apart is the hospitality. From the concierge, front desk, restaurant, play area, housekeeping, everyone is there to facilitate you.   We stayed for three nights which is really an excellent stay.  Walking into this property is like breathing hospitality.  People knocked themselves out to make our stay memorable and they anticipate all the things that are required for a lovely stay.    It is must go property especially with kids where they have lot many indoor games for all category kids & adults, heated pool and rich library.  Food quality & presentation is amazing.  It has been very well maintained though it is quite old heritage‚Ä¶

Though I personally was not staying at this property , however I wanted them to arrange something for my friend who was staying there for her 10th Wedding anniversary.  The team went out of their way to help me , took all their dietary preferences and helped me arrange everything i needed. They arranged a delicious cake from their end and connected me to a florist as i wanted to arrange the flowers my side. They even asked me for the couple's picture and gifted it to them as a souvenir from Hotel's side.  Starting from Ankita at the reception  , their Manager Deepika , the florist Kewal , staff members Sonam and Sadashivam . All of these people were a part of my friends happy experience which they will cherish forever.  Now i am looking forward to visit this property soon.

What does one call a home away from home?our stay at Cecil was one of such kind.we were pampered to the maximum by all the staff.We just had to request for something and within seconds they appeared like genies. Special thanks and great work Deepika Manager , Jaspal with his magical touch to the food and the way he obliged us. and not forgetting Vineet who had all the patience to explain everything in detail to us.Overall a beautiful property with a fantastic team.Just cannot wait to. revisit again.

Oberoi hospitality at its best. From check in to check out including housekeeping, activity center, spa, restaurant with each staff providing prompt, friendly and exceptional service. A Special call out to restaurant team-Rohit, Sidhant, Priya, Rajat, Divyanshi superbly led by Vineet who made sure every single meal was a memorable experience including for catering to kids needs!! Great work by Ankita, Rahul and Deepika for overall comfort and ease in getting things done‚Ä¶ overall best ever 3 days family stay with great hotel experience.. keep it up Cecil Oberoi team!!ever thinking of visiting Shimla-Oberoi Cecil is a must stay..!!

Spent a memorable 3 nights with my family at the Oberoi Cecil. The property itself might be smaller when compared to other Oberoi hotels. But they more than just make up for it with unarguably world class standards of customer service, attention to detail and etiquettes. Can't credit them enough for this. The front desk staff, the servers and the chef's. Everybody and everything was top notch. The long drive from Delhi and the associated fatigue simply evaporated after arriving at the Cecil. The activities center kept our 2 year old son. Hope to be back soon.

In covid times, we drew up the courage to take our 2 year old for a holiday for his birthday. We wanted the best available covid safety protocols in place, So we choose Oberoi Cecil.   Upon arrival we were welcomed with a warm immunity booster drink and everyone had masks gloves on. The checkin was done contact less and in less than 30 minutes we were in our room. The room was clean, warm and had beautiful view. Our baby felt at home almost instantly.     The food is delicious and the staff is very courteous and friendly. Chef was kind enough to serve us with some signature dishes - paneer lababdar, tandoori chicken etc. and every meal was special throughout our 2 night stay.  Special mention- the tandoori chicken is the best according to my husband and he would know he has‚Ä¶

Well Well Well, don‚Äôt know where to start. This review is about my recent visit to Shimla. I asked a few friends who have visited the place and gave me options of different hotels in Shimla. After all my research and feedback, while i was exploring the hotels . I saw Oberoi property ( Oberoi Cecil). Since I have stayed in Oberoi in the past , of-course in a different city and different country. I decided to stay in Oberoi Cecil. Man man man , what an experience. Hands down , out of all the stays I have had in best of the hotels but the experience in Oberoi Cecil. had been the best so far. The moment we checked in , front desk is so welcoming. Supervisor and front desk manager personally visited to greet and made my day. Rooms were spacious and properly was very warm and‚Ä¶

It was nice stay. Rooms were comfortable. Service of housekeeping & restaurant was excellent. Chef Rajkumar is a big asset of ur property. He served us as we were his personal guest. We were satisfied from his services. We will come soon. Tnk

Fun Food Friends n The Cecil   It was Independence Day Weekend stay at The Cecil for 6 of us ...3 couples....6 Friends since eons.  Going on a Holiday with Old Pals means, there's no room for pretense....it's just pure simple  unadulterated  unfiltered fun... but then there's a flipside....you are so caught up in your own world that quiet hushed environs are on more than a few times punctuated by boisterous laughs....the formal dining has 6 pals giving table etiquettes more than a miss or two....sharing soups n even main courses with gay abandon....  ....And this is where the Beauty of The Cecil came to the forefront....THE ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL STAFF ....at the restaurant, they simply played along, pampered us royally with the most delectable food, saying no to ABSOLUTELY‚Ä¶

Had a wonderful stay with the Oberoi Cecil. Really enjoyed the hospitality by the sweet and courteous staff. In particular enjoyed the delicious food prepared and served by the chef, Rajkumar Bhatia. Really felt at home. Made memories for life. Would definitely love to visit the property again.

Excellent service and care by entire staff particularly the warming welcome and during entire stay. The food tasted delicious especially the preparation by Chef Raj Kumar Bhatia was too good. Overall the stay was comfortable and memorable one.

I visited shimla three times before but this time it was an excellent stay despite raining. This was a birthday celebration of my wife. Santosh,sahil were excellent in housekeeping. Manasavi at front desk was excellent. Rohit and Sachin were excellent in dining along with whole staff. Wonderful experience. Keep it up.

‚ÄúAthithi devo bhava‚Äù (guest is god) is something that is a part of the oberoi group culture I am so appreciative that  exists a place that still values client service. From the General Manager Ms deepika kukreja to the door keeper, each one took great care of us. Such humble people with so much kindness in every gesture.. It was my husband‚Äôs 40th birthday celebration, and choosing Cecil the best decision we made as a family. The Front office incharge Mr. Kushagra, Ms. Manasvi, Ms. Ajita and others were welcoming like sunshine on a cloudy day, just a greeting from them brightened our day. The f&b team was simply lovely and like a genie would always say your wish is our command. We were honored that the President  of India was in Cecil the same time as us and they executed our‚Ä¶

Beautifully located property with old world charm. Staff is excellent, very warm and helpful. Our stay was slightly disturbed because of the VVIP visit but thats out of hotel control. Heated Swimming pool, breakfast spread and location of the property is excellent. Look out for Deepika at the front office for any extra help. Hotel graciously provides extra goodies and upgrades you where possible without asking for it!  Wonderful hospitality as expected from Oberoi.

The landmark property of the Oberoi group. Very pleasing experience to stay. Adrija‚Äôs hospitality was excellent. Chef Rajkumar pampers you with lip smacking recipes. All in all a great holiday experience.  Thanks to team Oberoi Cecil and I wish all of them a great future.

We had a wonderful experience at oberoi cecil. Each and every thing eas upto the mark. Staff and service at the property was above expectation.We would like to mention Chef Rajkumar and Adrija who made us feel pampered and made sure our stay is was fantastic..

We had an excellent trip to Shimla and stayed at Oberoi Cecil for 4 nights. It was a terrific experience, great location, very comfortable rooms and excellent staff. Overall Customer Service was world class. Will surely stay there again. Well done Oberoi Cecil!!

Had a fantastic time with family . Team Cecil made it possible - right from check in to services - Hospitality at its best .  Vineet , Sonam , Chef Raj Kumar Bhatia- All made our stay  comfortable and enjoyable .truly 5 star service from heart . Kids enjoyed the pool , activity center and food at

Stay in an heirloom Luxury place either for one day make me feel prodigious. The vintage affinity of the quondam British Raj. Incomparable hospitality. Kids received gifts from staff while checking in . Hygiene level is too high. Super easeful palatable food . Restaurant staff is beyond words and masterly helpful. They booked private pool timing too .

Had a wonderful stay in shimla , the hotel has this beautiful colonial vibe . Thanks to the staff , Bhanu and vineet  at the restaurant . the chef and the front office for going out ofvthe way to make my stay comfortable .

We visited Cecil after many years and were extremely happy with our  choice. The hotel has the best hospitality... starting from the smooth check in by Manasvi to the rooms, service, food, ambiance.. everything is perfect. It was a pleasure getting pampered by the hotel staff who went out of their way to celebrate my birthday all day long. Cake at the breakfast table, room decoration, special dinner...all

We stayed in Oberoi Cecil from 23rd to 27th Aug. This is just a pointer for the hotel  photograph used in most websites, which is misleading. The forest view shown in the photograph does not represent the actual experience as you enter the hotel. It is my suggestion to please change this.  Check-in was flowless and exceeded our expectations. We were made comfortable and served welcome drink to take away the tiredness of the journey. Then we were taken to the room and check-in formalities were completed in the room. There was an inviting collection of fruits in the room as a welcome gesture. The room itself was spacious, well organized and decorated. The valley view from the room was excellent, though we could enjoy it for two days due to clouds.  Breakfast was excellent. So was‚Ä¶

The food served at breakfast and dinner was spectacular! Each dish is so well prepared and as are the desserts and the staff so warm and courteous.  The chef Raj kumar personally checks in and ensures a great experience, definitely try out the Himachali cuisine.

Amazing hospitality by the hotel staff and scrumptious food by chef Rajkumar  Bhatia. Overall fantastic experience and beautiful hotel. Convieniently situated near the mall road. Beautiful colonial looking hotel

We liked  the ambiance as well as hospitality of the Oberoi Cecil Shimla. The quality of food was awesome. Mrs. Mami and manasvi welcomed us in a nice way. Mr. Raj kumar Bhatia( sous chef) is the person who prepared delicious food items for us. I would like to recommend people who want to enjoy their special occasions and days.

Stayed at this beautiful property a few weeks ago and loved every bit of our stay. Not only was the service completely on par with all the other Oberoi properties I‚Äôve stayed at, but the staff at the hotel was also really friendly and went out of their way to make sure we had a great time.  Will definitely come back and stay here again when I visit Shimla the next time!

It's an excellent property at a very good location. The cherry on the top was the he ad chef Mr Raj Kumar, he took very good care of us and he served most delicious food. Really appreciate the hospatility of staff and the vibes of this place..must visit.

We really enjoyed our stay here. The staff was extremely attentive, the hotel is kept up well and it's ideally situated to walk around Shimla. We had dithered about whether to stay at the Wildflower but we're glad we opted for the Cecil. It's an old-school-style hotel with modern service.

The stay at the Oberoi Cecil was absolutely exquisite Aryaman from Trident Mumbai was very effective in making our reservation and making sure we had an awesome experience.  We stayed for 3 nights and had breakfast and dinner included in our deal which was the best decision for this trip.

Was one of the best experience the staff and warmth is fabulous right from MR Nilesh , Ashutosh , Deepika  And of course the food the master chef Raj Kumar Bhatia , sadashivam , Sachin and nirbhay !!  What service must must go !!!! Don‚Äôt miss !!They pamper you like anything you ask and it‚Äôs there !!

The Oberio Cecil is an institution being such an old hotel the charm is still inviting. Over the years I have stayed in this hotel many times. The service gets better with each time I visit. Chef Raj Kumar, Chef Saurabh, Ashutosh and special mention for Mr Nilesh Jain the F&B Manager were just outstanding. The food made by Chef Raj Kumar was the most delectable. Mr Vishvish,Ms Deepika  and others at the front desk were very warm and courteous. Ms Mami from hospitality was like an old friend, what a charming lady. Her team made sure that the rooms and public areas were kept clean at all times. I want to thank each and everyone of the hotel staff for such an homely, warm and ever smiling.   Beautiful gifts were showered on us by the Oberio Cecil staff. Thank you so much till we‚Ä¶

Hospitality par excellence. Hotel staff very courteous and went out of their way . Special thanks to Mr Raj Kumar Bhatia ( chef) for the special dinner.         The location is good , short walk from the Mall road . The hotel also gave us drop off and pick up service from Mall road due to heavy rains.  Thanks to the entire team for making our holiday all the more special.

After being locked indoors for ages, I decided to drive down to Shimla on a whim and booked a stay with The Cecil for the weekend. This was my first stay at an Oberoi property and I can say with out exaggeration that this was perhaps the best service that I have experienced so far. The courteousness of the staff, their ability to remember your preferences even over just a 2 night stay. The little touches which just put a smile to your face in every interaction. The amazing food and prompt response to any request big or small. It was unfortunate that due to an accident, I could not experience the swimming pool or the spa on this trip but will look forward to visiting in the near future.

The executive chef Rajkumar Bhatia is a man of excellence .The services ,food are of A+grade .Its outstanding .It has special focus on cleanliness ,sanitation .The housekeeping staff is extremely friendly ,cooperative. We thanks all staff of oberoi Shimla for making our trip a memorable experience. Mrs mami housekeeping staff incharge is having the outstanding performance in cleanliness and sanitisation of premises.

Not someone who writes reviews very often, I am compelled to write this one, driven by the sheer overall excellence in service and hospitality standards, consistently exhibited by every single staff member during our recent stay at The Cecil, Shimla. Compliments to everyone from Front Desk, the restaurant, room service to housekeeping  - for their ever smiling and ready demeanor! Deepika at the Front Desk, Rahul from Reservations, Sous-Chef Rajkumar Bhatia and Zainab from Housekeeping deserve special mention for their thoughtfulness and cooperation! The food at the restaurant was consistently excellent throughout our stay and we very much appreciate the eager willingness of the Chef to prepare for us, items that were not even on the Menu! Lastly, I realised much after having‚Ä¶

Today we had dinner at Oberoi Cecil and meet a gem of a personality chef. Rajkumar Bhatia. If you are in this haven and wanna be tried like gods you must meet him and try Bhuna gosht. And I would highly recommend Oberoi group to add his recipe to wildflower as well, it is way better then Rogangosht that they serve in wildflower. Once again thank you chef. Rajkumar Bhatia for making our last night in Shimla so memorable.  Must visit Oberoi Cecil for bhuna gosht highly recommend.

Excellent experience,very cooperative staff very helpful .the property need a bit of renovations .food is v tasty and chef raj kumar is really helpful .nice experience. Management gives its 100 % to fix up any issues. Really happy wd the overall experience.

It was wonderful  experience and the best part was my daughter which is 2 .5 years old  only drinks milk and that too mildly warm there milk service was round the clock available for us without any delay whether it was 3 o‚Äôclock in the night or 8 in the morning milk was just phone away from us   They were really very professional people always had smile on there faces

The hotel is a bit away from the bustle of the city. The service and staff are excellent and always ready to pay attention to any feedback. Rooms are nice though the bathroom is tiny.  The only minus is that it doesn't have any garden which is so important in a hill station. The in room dining was good though the breakfast was a bit average, not in the spread but the quality of some of the preparations.  Check in was smooth and their welcome drink deserves special mention. We stayed only for 1 night as a transit to Wildflower hall,  Masobhra.

I loved enthusiasm of Mr Vishvesh and Mr Aman and Prateik.Thanks for the souvenir.Food was awesome but due to busy season we felt that oberoi staff was bit over worked . Just a suggestion : Balcony rooms should have a balcony to visit else it does not give a good impression .Thanks Mr Amardeep for courteous call when I gave him suggestion about necessary changes too .

The best part of the property is it‚Äôs heritage architecture and interiors. It‚Äôs a 137 years old property with rich history. Oberoi group  has always kept up to its image for its hospitality. Warm welcome from polite staff and a great welcome drink. I stayed at this property with my wife and I was here for my honeymoon. Chef Raj Kumar at hotel was great. Gave  personal attention he makes delicious food.

Outstanding hospitality. Exceptional staff in general, Vishvesh in particular took great care of us. Food and the services were exceptional and the lounge with the live music is great to relax over a drink.  Conveniently located and on the historic vintage trail. Great overall experience.

With the second wave of the Covid 19 pandemic on the wane and lockdowns getting relaxed across India, getting out of the fiercely blazing Delhi summer became an imperative. Himachal Pradesh, our favourite getaway state remained on top of our list.   Without a thought we chose the conveniently located hill station Shimla and the Cecil hotel, a heritage property and gem in the crown of the Oberoi Group.  Having experienced and enjoyed the impeccable hospitality of the Group at various times, we were ready to be pampered. And as usual the hotel did not disappoint. Cecil far exceeded our expectations with its lovely rooms, brilliant food, unmatched ambiance and exceptional care by all staff members.   Having opted for the ‚Äòall meals included‚Äô package for our three-day stay, we were‚Ä¶

one can never go wrong with Oberoi hospitality.  the check-in was smooth, staff was helpful and more than willing to serve you.  however, looks like they were sold out for the dates when we stayed and there was huge crowd every day during breakfast hours which created some confusion and chaos.    Property is of colonial era and they have managed to keep it like this even after renovations and refurbishment.   Rooms are big and spacious, breakfast spread was huge and delectable.  special shout to chef Bhatia ji for dishing out amazing dishes during our stay, Nilesh, the F&B manager for being so patient and courteous, GM, Amardeep ji who had foot injury and even then taking rounds of property and all those whose name I have not mentioned here but were all instrumental in making‚Ä¶

We went to Shimla for a weekend family outing last week and stayed at Oberoi Cecil,  It was our 5th stay at Cecil Shimla in 7 years, the best hotel to stay in Shimla at Mall road‡•§  Awesome hotel, best and hyegenic facilities, best in class hospitality, they never say no to anything,   We took a dinner package and the restaurant staff served us in our rooms late till 11,00 pm, always feels like home to us,

One of the best stays of our life ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è. Oberoi‚Äôs u were totally awesome, never seen such an amazing hospitality before.. chef MR Rajkumar Bhatia was the pick of the gang, super chef & what delicious food he got us.. tanvi & karki in Restuarent were pretty helpful, u say it, they had it for u !! Mami we will miss u even after our stay, my daughter had a twisted ankle, Mami spec illah visited our room with medicines & bandage.  Deepika their head, made sure we had super comfortable stay.. keep it up guys, there should be a case study on u guys üôåüòä

Delightful stay at The Oberoi Cecil. Our suite was huge and comfortable . The staff was very prompt and catered to every small request . The hotel followed Covid Protocol very strictly. The swimming pool was closed but the Spa was operational. Mr Amardeep, the general manager is a gem of the Oberoi Group . Vineet and Nilesh in F n B, Chef Saurabh and Chef Rajkumar, Mami in housekeeping made sure we had a very convenient stay . We cannot wait to visit again.

We stayed at the Oberoi Cecil for 4 days. The stay was very comfortable and the team is commendable. They are very cooperative and fulfilled all our needs. We booked a car from the hotel and they had thoroughly sanitised it for our safety. The food was excellent and they maintained hygiene standard at all times. A member of our family fell ill, the whole team-  Ms. Deepika,  Mr. Amardeep, Mr. Ashutosh,  Mr. Rajkumar and many more were extremely supportive and stood by us during our hard time. They helped us with the medicines and doctors at emergency. They made us feel like home and treated us like family. They went out of the way and did more than necessary. The staff was brilliant. At any point of time, be it midnight, they stood like pillars to help us out. They did‚Ä¶

As expected Oberoi outdoes their hospitality each and every time! We stayed for 3 nights with family and all the staff went the extra mile to make our stay memorable! Thanks to Mami and Veronica for ensuring our rooms were well sanitised as we were quite paranoid due to Covid. Chef Raj Kumar Bhatia made all our meals delightful with his personal touch and always checking on how he could make our meal even better and the entire team at the Lounge and The Restaurant for taking care of the smallest details! And lastly thanks to the GM - Mr. Amandeep who connected us to Mr. Randeep - an expert on Shimla who guided us about the most wonderful off-beat spots which had most breathtaking views!  We are taking back wonderful memories from this trip! Thank you Cecil :)

The hospitality of Cecil oberoi is unbeaten.  I was travelling with few friends of mine and we all had a lovely time.   The food was beyond expectation.  The spread at breakfast was to die for. Special thanks to Chef Rajkumar, he chatted all the dishes as per our expectations, in fact exceeded our expectations. His recommendations are remarkable and added sparkle to our trip with the amazing hospitality of him and his team.    It was indeed one memorable trip, looking forward to staying here again soon

We had a wonderful stay, all thanks to Ms Deepika and hus team and the amazing food cooked by Mr RajKumar. Very good hospitality, we highly recommend stay at the Oberoi Cecil, Shimla. We thoroughly enjoyed.

I was really impressed by the hospitality. Especially when it comes to food, so being a Jain, chef Rajkumar showed really good response and positively he was ready to make anything I asked. Completely loved every minute I spent here with my friends. Special thanks to Chef Rajkumar who made very meal worth it.    When it comes to hospitality no other hotel can beat this experience. Our meals were customised as per our taste and were worth all the hype.

After lockdown , Shimla was a perfect getaway. Since we wanted to see people we decided to stay near the Mall road. Cecile was an unanimous choice.  Sous chef, Rajkumar Bhaia took special care of us and even shared his prized recipes and " taste secrets" . He also shared his success story , which was very very inspiring.  Pradeep did an amazing job of decorating our room , for my husband's birthday.  Nilesh, the F&B manager organised a himachali meal for us.  Saurabh the mixologist, at the lobby bar concocted interesting cocktails for us.  Mami dropped by with her cheerful chitchats . Overall an amazing stay. We would definitely like to come back again .

Excellent efficient staff. Chef Rajkumar Bhatia was great with his food n service. Priya was super efficient with her table service .Several other names I‚Äôd like to mention, & will shortly. Wonderful stay at The Oberoi Cecil Special thanks to Ms Deepika & Chef Raj Kumar for making stay comfortable and delicious food. chef‚Äôs recommendations were worth the wait. Had one of the best local cuisines of Himachal. Thank you very much for such good hospitality.

Oberoi Cecil is my idea of pure luxury with a personal touch . It‚Äôs been a go to destination primarily because of the staff . Absolutely amazing . All departments whether F&B , housekeeping or front desk , even the guards are absolutely amazing .  Mr. Raj Kumar the chef is a mind reader . Whom not to mention in my gesture of gratitude is an issue . Would be unfair not to include all the names .  Each and every‚Ä¶

Visiting Cecil every time is a wonderful experience. The warmth and hospitality offered here cannot be found elsewhere. The food is absolutely delectable and chef Rajkumar takes care of every need and requirement, you ask for any dish and it‚Äôs prepared at its best for you. Saurabh at the lounge makes some of the most delicious concoctions of drinks and is extremely nice.  As a whole the staff at Cecil provide an immaculate experience which cannot be forgotten.

Had a good time in cecil Oberoi! The staff is very friendly and helpful! Don‚Äôt remember much but there was a girl Abhiniti, she‚Äôs very kind and helpful! The service and the stay was very comfortable!!

Amazing place to stay in Shimla. We stayed here for two nights and the experience was wonderful. Chef RAJ KUMAR BHATIA made mouth watering delicaciesü§ç And is the best human in his profession. üßø looking forward to visit this exquisite property again.

Was there for a 3 nights holiday with my kids.  The staff was very courteous and service was prompt except breakfast which they couldn‚Äôt control as the hotel was full due to 26th JAN long weekend and most guests used to patronise at the same time.  One room was upgraded to a suite without requesting for it which as a pleasant surprise.  Had a nice time.

We stayed at the hotel for 6 days and the property has a lot of amenities in itself.The whole staff was accommodating and understanding which we really appreciated but I‚Äôd especially like to mention chef Rajkumar Bhatia who prepared a range of personalised delicacies for us all along the duration of our stay.

Most amazing experience with efficient staff and friendly great hospitality special thanks to Deepika and her team for making our trip most memorable holiday , keep it up Deepika and team , rooms were comfortable service was far out food was good , Deepika is a very efficient and her team is polite and helpful

We really had great time, I loved everything. Such an amazing food, what an awesome food chef has prepared, was such delicious n mouth watering.   My kid was so happy to be here,  just an extra attention towards kids make them happy and so I am.  Such an nice games n gift they got. üòÄüòÄüòÉ  What an amazing staff, like danish and abhineeti..  How everybody‚Äôs is smiling all the time, that makes us feel really nice in such COVID times

Amazing property with wonderful hospitality special thanks Mr. Rajkumar Bhatia they serve delicious food again i thanks to Danish, Abhiniti and Sakshi must stay property in shimla.. 5/5 rating. Rooms was so clean yovian is always attending our calls

Before booking a night in Cecil Hotel, Shimla i was wondering why this Hotel is rated 10 out of 10. But now since i have visited this place, it is actually worth more than 10 had it been an option. You would love the hospitality, the entire staff, food, everything is best. Have visited several best rated properties throughout the world, but Cecil is different. Ms. Deepika, Front Desk Manager, would help you with quick comfortable Check-In and throughout your stay, making it memorable. In fact the entire staff is very cooperative. Whenever you visit, do ask for Chef Rajkumar Bhatia, he is a gem for Oberoi Group. You ask him, whatever you would like to eat, and he will prepare the best for you. Thanks Oberoi Group for such a wonderful experience.

Amazing hospitality. Delicious food. Perfect hygiene. A heritage building with one of a kind architecture. The manager Deepika was an excellent host who provided us extra amenities and made our stay feel like home. The team ensured proper implementation of covid appropriate behaviour.

Have stayed at The Cecil, Shimla  several times over the years, the last being for 5 nights in June 2017. This was the first hotel owned by the Oberois but underwent a major restoration in the mid-1990s. It is well located away from the hustle and bustle of the Mall Road but still a pleasant 25-30 minutes walk to the centre.  In the opposite direction, a steep walk through the pine trees takes you to the beautiful Viceregal Lodge which houses the Indian Institute of Advanced Studies. We usually stay in the Luxury rooms in the main block which are huge and well appointed. The atrium lobby is the heart of the hotel and a good place to spend time reading something, enjoying tea/coffee & pastries or just people watching! There is also an indoor heated swimming pool, spa and activity‚Ä¶

The hotel is very nice, with decent ancient look. The location of the hotel is in posh area, near Shimla Vidhan bhavan. When we talk about service of the hotel, it proves that it is really a 5star hotel.Thotel.The staff is so curious & caring. TheIr service is really very good. When it comes to food their food quality, service quality is excellentexcellent.The head cheff Mr. Rajkumar Bhatiya is really a gentleman.He tried to fulfill all our demands, with smiling face. The quality of food is excellent.

Oberoi Cecil - an absolutely stunning, welcoming, cozy place with the most warm and friendly staff always going out of their way to make you feel special.   My family and I are foodies and Chef Raj Kumar Bhatia is the DEFINITION OF CULINARY SKILLS! I wonder why he hasn‚Äôt participated in MasterChef; he would win hands down! Apart from trying out some of our favourite items on the menu, we were craving some of our very special Sindhi dishes. We happened to mention it to him and the very next day we were presented with a feast! He nailed every item to the T! Attached are just a couple of photos I happened to click for my Instagram stories but trust me those aren‚Äôt even the tip of the iceberg. It‚Äôs not even 1/10th of what we ate. That‚Äôs how much we ate! My favourite - tandoori‚Ä¶

The Oberoi Cecil, Shimla was one of a kind, gorgeous hotel which had the most amazing staff with the best hospitality. We‚Äôve experienced such great hospitality at very few hotels and Oberoi Cecil tops the list.  Our meals were at the hotel itself, and every meal of ours was prepared by their great Chef Rajkumar Bhatia, he‚Äôs a chef par excellence. He made us any dish we desired and it was made to perfection.  He didn‚Äôt only satisfy our stomachs but also, our hearts with his warm nature. As long as he‚Äôs the chef at Oberoi Cecil, we would definitely visit it again.

Oberoi Cecil is amazing heritage hotel , staff is very friendly and cooperative ,services are excellent, the most I like about chef Rajkumar Bhatia made different types of dishes which our family enjoyed a lot , so I personally recommend to go in this heritage hotel

If you want to reward yourself and want to get pampered don't think further, just pack your bags and go to Cecil.  On main entrance you'll meet Rahul who will be your concierge who will mesmerize you with his soft spoken pleasent personality.    Word of caution: Don't interact too much with Rajkumar, Chef because after eating his signature chicken & desert you would never want to leave that place.  Rajkumar ji also gave me Shimla potrait which I've duly framed & a recipe too.  My eight year old daughter said that from now on she will stay at Cecil Oberoi only & why not as she spent her total visit in activity center which was well monitored with experience caretaker.  In all I was unable to point out any flaw. It's flawless.

We visited Shimla in last week of March 2021. We stayed at Oberio Cecil. As they say first impression is the last impression, when we checked in, the first view of the majestic lounge area gave us a glimpse of what we‚Äôre to look forward to in coming days and we were not disappointed at all!  From the well laid out spic and span rooms with balcony for a view to die for, kids play are, swimming pool, spa, spacious dining area, you name it and they have it!  And Above all I would like to specially mention the heart touching experience we had while interacting with each and every member of the staff. From Ms Deepika Kukreja and team including Meghna at the reception to welcome you to Mr Rajkumar Bhatia, Sous Chef and team including Karki, Priya, Sonam and others to dish out‚Ä¶

An amazing hotel with great food.The chef there Raj Kumar Bhatia made some amazing dishes.It is a great place for kids as well with many indoor activities.This property has great hospitality and is very welcoming

I stayed at The cesil, Oberoi‚Äôs and I truly had the best experience. The staff was incredible. The rooms were also pretty good always neat and tidy, well maintained. The chef, Rajkumar Bhatia was excellent the food was also very good and tasty. But the chef was mind blowing.

We stayed for 5 days at Cecil. It is a heritage property. Was built in 1884. The common areas as well as the rooms are well maintained and clean.  The hotel staff is super courteous and takes great care of the guests. During my entire stay, not even once I heard anybody saying ‚Äúno‚Äù or ‚Äúnot possible‚Äù. Whether I speak of room service or housekeeping or restaurant folks.  The food is absolutely lip smacking. The head chef and his team are brilliant. A huge shoutout goes to Rajkumar Bhatia. Proof lies in me gaining many kgs. ÔÅä  On the service part in restaurant, special shoutout goes to Vineet Sharma who was very hospitable. He had good knowledge of all cuisines and recommend some fantastic dishes.  I had issues with people not wearing masks in buffet area. Hotel promptly took steps‚Ä¶

We stayed at the hotel from 27th March till 2nd April. We had an amazing stay. Gureet and Deepika checked us in..  they surprised us by upgrading us to the luxury suite.. it was a wonderful gesture and added so much to our experience ( especially since it had a huge balcony where I spent a lot of time). It's a heritage property.. but it's maintained really well.. kudos to the housekeeping team. The atrium is the most defining feature..in the evenings there is live piano in the atrium which made the whole ambience magical..  Chef Raj Bhatia.. a wonderful host. wanting to delight us at every meal..  regularly surprised us by serving his special creations at various meals..  we tried almost everything on the menu.. considering we were there was 6 days.. everything was just‚Ä¶

Very well located, one can easily drive up to the entrance of the hotel. Parking for a limited number of vehicles is located right in front of the entrance, across the road. Rooms are good and spotlessly clean. We had a premium room that had a beautiful view from the window. The staff is extremely courteous and helpful. Restaurant has good ambience. The chef took extra pains to take suggestions to prepare meals to our taste. A nice experience, would love to be back there anytime.

Cecil Oberoi is a Beautiful property.  What makes it so perfect is its Hospitality.  We were there for 3 nights.  The entire staff is so warm and welcoming.  Starting from the doorman to the people at the reception to the housekeeping  , everyone was so good . Special mention of Santosh from the housekeeping department , he was so concerned to make our stay an extremely comfortable one. Kudos to the entire team of Cecil, Deepika , Mami , Chef Rajkumar, Santosh ,Sonam and everyone else . Thanks a lot . Looking forward to come again

Good location near to mall..hospitality at its best..food is amazing..special thanks to Chef Raj kumar and his team..were upgraded to suite which was good..tried some local Himachali food which was very good and authentic..pool open now and COVID precautions were taken care of..

We are a regular visitor to the Oberoi Cecil Shimla for past many years and during this pandemic time, we could not think of a better place to go than here. As always the experience did not disappoint us this time as well. We were there for 3 nights from the 24th of March to the 27th of March 2021. Right from the check it felt like a homecoming. Each and every member of the staff treated us like a king. The chef Mr. Rajkumar deserves a special mention here who made us some delicious and amazing meals. The Chole Bhature he made (which was off-menu and specially prepared) were to die for. The Chef even treated us with a delicious serving of his special Papdi Chaat which was phenomenal.. Not to forget the front office staff including Ms. Dipika who went all out to make our stay a‚Ä¶

Was there for 3 nights in March. Staff was very hospitable and courteous. They take care of all your needs. Food is delicious. It is a very old property but gets you the right  experience of a heritage property. I was traveling with a 7 year old kid and he had loads of fun in the well equipped activity room they have.

Charm and gracious hospitality personified. Grand old property but immaculately maintained. The staff is outstanding. There is always a smile on thier faces and they are willing to help you with whatever you may need.  The fine dining experience was outstanding. Our special thanks to Sous Chef Raj for his gracious hospitality. He surprised us at every meal with some special signature item of his own creation.  Overall if you are visiting Shimla this is probably the best property you can book. Do yourself a favour and indulge at the Oberoi Cecil!

I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Shimla for the first time. Bang in the middle of Shimla, it has this beautiful colonial feel to it. The finest hotel in Shimla, the Cecil has a lot of history behind it. The interiors are fabulous. To give them credit, despite the lockdown shaking up the hotel industry, they managed to provide top class service. The food, service, hospitality resulted in a beautiful experience. Am coming here again one day.

We were a group of 6 couples and all of us were overwhelmed by the courtesy and warmth of  the entire team of Oberoi Cecil Shimla starting from Nilesh jain (GM), front desk Rahul, Deepika, Chef Rajkumar,  Shivam at the restaurant and Bhanu in house keeping.  - Jayesh Kothari  Room - 411 13th to 16th March 2021

Beautiful location. Exceptional service. Best swimming pool in Himachal. Everything at par or beyond.  Ms. Deepika Kukreja made sure that we have a comfortable stay. All the staff was so attentive and courteous. Pooja is the kids room was so polite and looked nicely after my two years old.  Chef Raj Bhatia was amazing host. He fed us too much with lots of love. He is the best at what he does.  Kudos to the housekeeping staff. Ms. Dolkar did exceptional job. She decorated our room and left a heart warming personal note. Ms. Miami was also there all the time and looked after us. Saurabh at the lounge bar was excellent. Loved the cocktails he served. Thanks to Deepika and her team for making our stay memorable.

What a ravishing experience!!! It was an incredible experience with my kids and family for 3 nights stay at Oberoi Cecil, Shimla. During these tough COVID times, all measures and hygiene were properly taken care of. All staff was so professional, proactive, humble with positive gesture and caring attitude which makes you guys stand different from others.   Top quality food with many varieties including esp. what we Delhiites like the most, the spicy ones.   There was big SMILE on my kids and family‚Äôs face throughout our stay and that matters the most to any of us.   I would highly recommend this property to all since it doesn‚Äôt make sense to complete your Shimla trip without staying at this Heritage property 137 years old and so well maintained with high class amenities and best‚Ä¶

Such a warm wonderful welcome by the staff. Our dinner @ The Restaurant was highly pleasing. VIJAY took an extra mile and made it memorable for us.  Thai green curry, club sandwich and prawns MUST HAVES for savoury scrumptious Shimla experience. #delightful&delectabledinner. Thank you .

Truly Loved our dinner made special by VIJAY @ the restaurant. Thai curry, prawns and club s/which MUST HAVE. A great place to spend time with friends and family. Will love to come here in a short while.

Hearing about Oberoi hospitality & experiencing it to T. No such thing as too much hospitality at Oberoi Cecil from the moment you are checked in.   They are polite, courteous and warm and if you are a solo traveller, breathe easy, you are at the right place. From allocating a safe environment to ensuring you are looked after and not stuck, everyone from check-in folks (Irish & Maithalee), to housekeeping by Ms. Mami & team (shout-out to Bhowmick), F&B Manager Mr. Nilesh Jain & team work together to look out for all that you would require.   Side Note: You do not want to miss out and not book yourself a massage at the spa. Tshering has magic in her hands, I kid you not.   The food is fresh, locally sourced and delectable. Kudos to Chef Raj Kumar Bhatia - a lovely person, he‚Ä¶

Amazing hotel, very nice food, staff was excellent. Raj kumar Bhatia and his team was excellent in service. Must visit hotel, perfect location.......... Team is excellent, very cooperative, polite, Bhatia ji that you, excellent service

Me and my wife travelled to Shimla in mid of March, we were unsure where to stay during our visit, while driving we called up Cecil and they direct of our call to CRM and our booking was confirmed without any hassle.  Upon arrival we were greeted by Ms. Maitali who took us directly to our room and did the check-in procedure in the room after making us comfortable since we arrived late in the evening. Coffee was fine , I mean just usual but then our server , Shivam noticed our reluctance towards the coffee and proactively asked us is everything okay with the coffee, turned out he has detailed knowledge about the coffee and he has his own brew (secret recipe ofcourse) which he offered to us on the house. This was the 2nd time i stayed at Cecil, albeit for only one night. Since i have already given 5/5 rating, i really don't have any complaints or issues, but would point out what I felt at certain things:  1) I was asked to pay advance for incidentals. This practice is probably the most irksome practice a 5 star hotel could follow. Just cant understand the logic, especially when hotel tariff is 100% paid for in advance. Oberoi, ITC and Taj are definitely not in that league to ask for advance against perceived incidentals.  2) Contrary to Tripadvisor reviews, i believe food pricing is apt. But, tad bit work on quantity is required. For eg, i ordered a Chicken Biryani, the handi could have been just that tad bit bigger to have accommodated that tad bit of extra rice. In the end we‚Ä¶

Our stay at Cecil was for 3 days, and we were blown away by the hotel, it's ambience and service. The staff is warm and welcoming. The food was excellent. We hired the hotel tour guide Randeep for the hike and cycling experience and it was very well organised. Thank you Oberoi Cecil and it's team!

We stayed here for a week towards the end of November . The Hotel safety precautions and staff is outstanding they went out of there way to make sure that our stay is memorable. We celebrated Our Anniversary and our Daughters Birthday and they made both the  special occasions extra special for us!!!. Thank you Mr Singh , Aayushi  and Vineet , Shalini and the entire staff . We just loved it and hope to be visiting you soon.

The Oberoi Cecil is one of the best hotel in Shimla.Service provided from every staff is excellent.Hotel is proven its 5 stars .I am very happy as they tried my marriage anniversary a memorable day in a short time .

I stayed at The Obeoi Cecil on 19th November . Right from the welcome and check in to the check out it was an amazing experience. Each and every staff member went out of their way to make it special for us.   Stayed in room no 212 and Views were Amazing  Looking forward to Visit Again

We visited Oberoi Cecil for our wedding anniversary. The entire staff was very nice and courteous. I would like to give special mention to the sous chef - Rajkumar Bhatia. He cooked special anniversary dinner for us which includes salad, garlic bread, pasta and pizza. All the dishes were made of high quality ingredients and tasted amazing. Not to mention the special Ras malai which he offered us for this special occasion. I would highly recommend Oberoi Cecil and the sous chef - Mr.Bhatia.

Since Covid-19 pandemic had destroyed all my prior plans of travel, I was most excited and wanted to get out of my house.  I was in Shimla in the month of November 2020 for a leisure trip with my family. I chose to stay with Oberoi Cecil which seemed upto my taste and within a few minutes of the reach to the famous Mall Road of Shimla. Also They follow the highest standards of cleanliness and hygiene to mitigate the risks associated with the coronavirus.  I cannot be more objective about this hotel because the staff was more than kind, attentive, compassionate and supportive of me. Since the time before check-in, Miss. Deepika Kukreja was in constant touch with me and also made sure that all my queries were addressed. During our check-in and throughout our stay Mr.Nilesh Jain‚Ä¶

I always have high expectations of a brand like Oberoi but to say Oberoi Cecil surpassed any expectation I had would be an understatement. I don't exaggerate when I say the service at Oberoi Cecil is literally world-class.   Booking was a breeze directly through Oberoi. Deepika at the front desk was in touch with us before we arrived and had the perfect room for us ready and waiting and her, along with Maithili, helped us through a very quick and breezy check-in process.  The room itself is perfection. We had a wonderful room overlooking the valley with wonderful views of the sunrise as well as the sunset. It doesn't matter how cold it gets outside, the room remains comfortable and toasty warm. The room has every modern amenity you could ask for but its USP is the sheer comfort‚Ä¶

It was my 3rd visit to Cecil, and it was wonderful yet again. We went there to celebrate our daughter's 10th birthday. Special care was taken by Executive Chef Gunjit and Chef Raj Kumar. Just one thing I notice that in the evening there was no security at the main entrance, I request the management to look into it.  rest all good Salute to the Oberio's

I stayed at Oberoi Cecil for two days last week. Right from the welcome and check in to the check out it was an amazing experience. Each and every staff member went out of their way to make it special for us. Ayushi and Abhishek at the restaurant were exceptional in looking after every

Great food with lovely hospitality, as expected from an Oberoi approved hotel. Will definitely visit again to be spoiled by the delicacies made by Sous Chef Rajkumar Bhatia and to be pampered by the warm and welcoming staff.

The fact that I am almost a year late in writing a review and yet remember every little detail of our stay so fondly and yearn to go back again explains how absolutely delightful our stay was.   Brilliant hospitality, prompt service every time, amazing food and a feeling of home are just some of the great aspects of our stay here.

Oberoi always lives upto it‚Äôs expectations. It was my second visit here and I must say that the hospitality is at par with the best hotels in the world. The Sous Chef, Mr Rajkumar Bhatia gave us excellent service and treatment. Highly recommend this property of Oberois with excellent views and great food!!

Our family stayed at The Oberoi Cecil, Shimla for more than a week in October 2020 and the experience was out of this world.   The food is mouth-watering and very flavorful. Chef Raj Kumar Bhatia does his best to please by whipping up the most delectable dishes ranging from delicious daily fare like kadhi rice, pizzas, biryani to exotic trout preparations and sophisticated desserts...both pleasing to the eye and the palate. He curated special meals for us and made us feel like Royalty !  Housekeeping is exceptional - dedication of staff is amazing. From upkeep of the rooms to taking care of our in-house entertainment.  Finally the check-in and reception are secure, safety measures are in place and all precautions are being taken. The best part about the Cecil is definitely its‚Ä¶

My parents Mr. Pradeep and Mrs. Amita Sabharwal stayed here last week. The experience of booking was smooth and exceeded expectations, thank you Mr. Aryaman Kapur for helping make this possible.   My parents were impressed with the level of sanitization and hygiene maintained, the room with a great view, as well as celebrating their anniversary so fondly. Food was innovative.

It was actually Sept 2019 we stayed at The Cecil.   From the moment we stepped through the doors to the moment we left we felt like we were the most special , cared for guests in the whole world. Our room was amazing at the front by the road but very quiet, the room was huge with a seating area , a large dressing area and a glorious bathroom... Everything was spotless...  We add the adjoining room for our adult son and his room was amazing as well.The staff were the best we have ever encountered in any hotel around the world and we have travelled much; even dare I say better than the staff on Cunard liners which is saying something!!  Even as we were touring the Vice Royals home the staff approached us  in such a lovely friendly courteous manner, a credit to the hotel  . We‚Ä¶

I visited the Oberon Cecil for 3 nights as part of a group stay. As everyone else has said this is an excellent hotel with great staff. Could not fault anything. Would be my first choice when returning to Shimla. Wildflower Hall (also Oberoi) is well worth a stop for coffee or afternoon tea.

After an 8 hour drive we were delighted to arrive at the hotel. Our timing was good as no sooner had we checked in than two very large groups of train buffs arrived and took the place over. We were shown to our Luxury Rooms with wonderful views over Shimla to the mountains  beyond.  There was tea and coffee and bottled water available.  The rooms certainly were beautifully fitted out and the bathrooms had all modern facilities done in a traditional way. After a walking tour on the first day I booked in for a foot and leg massage in the spa which was excellent. There were two large dining rooms which were full of groups and another area which were tables off a central walkway with people coming and going.  We felt pushed out by the groups.  We were encouraged to try the evening‚Ä¶

Elegant Hotel in Beautiful Mountainous Shimla .Full of character with modern facilities. Very comfortable , superb service , very warm indoor pool ,delicious meals . Excellent breakfasts and buffets but the special Indian set dinner menu and typical Indian breakfast particularly recommended .All the dishes were well explained  Wonderful hotel and most memorable stay .

Wonderful old hotel, massive rooms, great swimming pool and beauty salon. Food excellent and service second to none. We could easily have spent a week here instead of 2 nights. Bar a little pricy but we were getting used to that. 15-20 mins walk into the centre of Shimla but perfectly safe.

Our stay at the Oberoi Cecil was truly memorable.  From the time we arrived until we left we were treated by charming, helpful, friendly staff, who went out of their way to ensure we were comfortable.  The room was well appointed and the bed very comfortable.  The lounge was an excellent place for a pre-dinner drink.  Dining was enjoyable with an excellent dinner buffet, where there was a good choice of appetising dishes.  Breakfast was a-la-carte and one of the best I have been served.  This is definitely a hotel I would go back to!

Large and impressive colonial style hotel. Splendid atrium with bar and lounge on ground floor. Quality public areas and dining rooms. Excellent guest rooms and very polite and courteous staff. Very good breakfast and sumptuous buffet dinner. Some rooms with splendid views but rooms on street side somewhat noisy.

A beautiful old hotel with much to offer. Magnificent lounge and bar area just inside the entrance, along with large, very well appointed rooms. Timber floors with rugs, dressing room, good sized bathroom, small balcony with great views, which include the Himalayas on a clear day. The restaurant offered excellent Indian food, buffet or a la carte, along some outstanding western dishes. The most outstanding feature of the hotel were the staff. Friendly, very efficient, not condescending, just brilliant people.

Fantastic hotel with very large rooms.  Staff very friendly and helpful.  Beautiful views from our room.  Indoor pool was clean and enjoyable.  Visited hotel for 3 nights during a Golden Triangle Tour.  Food exceptionally high standard.

Where should i start from.... this place ‚Äú Cecil in Shimla is simply devine & on top of that the Super Chef named ‚ÄúMr. Rajkumar Bhatia‚Äù made our stay more special with his awesome food he cooked specially for us. The quality & the ingredients used were superb. The best part was my daughter‚Äôs birthday, where she had her first outside meal cooked by Mr. Bhatia, she simply loved it... A round of applause for u Mr. Chef :) Keep up the good work & All the very best!!

Seldom does one come across a hotel which is comfortable, well run and with staff who care.  Somewhat old-fashioned, with wood panelling but well kept and clean.  The staff really seemed to care and were excellent.  Not just good training but with good manners and character.

Visited Oberoi Cecil last year, It is a heritage hotel with beautifully designed rooms gives you a feel of a royal hospitality.   Crisp and warm welcome greets you at the entrance , never experienced a better welcome from the doorman the way charming lady here does, totally upbeat.  All hotel staff are proactive and gives you impeccable service , its like getting pampered with oberoi hospitality.  Food menu is delightful and appetizing with proficient staff  who can guide you through the dishes with an ease.  Lobby and bar lounge area is exquisite with beautiful wooden interiors gives you a glimpse of all rooms ,  with a bar which makes some nice cocktails  and a piano man , playing amazing indian and western tunes.
